tasks.label: Git Commit
tasks.command:
git commit -m "ci(lint,coverage,build): fix super-linter markdown config; stabilize llvm-cov; add cross-linkers

Changes Made:

ci(lint): remove legacy MARKDOWN_LINTER_RULES that caused container path resolution to /action/lib/.automation; keep MARKDOWN_CONFIG_FILE (.github/linters/super-linter-ci.env).
- [.github/linters/super-linter-ci.env] - drop MARKDOWN_LINTER_RULES; bump header version.

ci(coverage): harden cargo-llvm-cov step; ensure htmlcov dir and verbose output for diagnostics.
- [.github/workflows/ci.yml] - create htmlcov; add --verbose; bump workflow version.

ci(build): fix aarch64 and musl cross-linker errors in release builds.
- [.cargo/config.toml] - add per-target linkers for aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu and x86_64-unknown-linux-musl.
- [.github/workflows/release-rust.yml] - export CC/CARGO_TARGET_*_LINKER env for robustness; bump version.

ci(rustfmt): ensure CI uses repo rustfmt config via RUSTFMT_CONFIG_FILE for Test Rust job.
- [.github/workflows/ci.yml] - set RUSTFMT_CONFIG_FILE for test-rust job."
